metadata.notes: Designed for broad coverage of Kaldheim mechanics. Includes Foretell, Boast, Sagas (as subtype), Snow synergies, Vehicles, Runes (Auras), and Changeling. Some MDFC-like concepts are modeled as single-faced cards.
